description: Data for Minecraft Bedrock Edition addons.

properties.title: properties
properties.description: The properties for this block. block_properties.

minecraft:block_light_absorption.title: minecraft:block_light_absorption
minecraft:block_light_absorption.description: The amount of light this block will absorb.

minecraft:block_light_emission.title: minecraft:block_light_emission
minecraft:block_light_emission.description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

minecraft:breakonpush.title: minecraft:breakonpush
minecraft:breakonpush.description: When pushed by a piston the block breaks

minecraft:breathability.title: minecraft:breathability
minecraft:breathability.description: Property describing the breathability of this block and whether it is treated as a solid or as air.

minecraft:destroy_time.title: minecraft:destroy_time
minecraft:destroy_time.description: Sets the destroy time property for the block. Greater numbers result in greater mining times.

minecraft:display_name.title: minecraft:display_name
minecraft:display_name.description: Specifies the display name id for the block.

minecraft:entity_collision.title: minecraft:entity_collision
minecraft:entity_collision.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities

origin.title: origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box

size.title: origin
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component

minecraft:explosion_resistance.title: minecraft:explosion_resistance
minecraft:explosion_resistance.description: Sets the explosion resistance for this block.

minecraft:flammable.title: minecraft:flammable
minecraft:flammable.description: Describes the flammable properties for this block.

burn_odds.title: burn_odds
burn_odds.description: How likely the block will be destroyed by flames when on fire.

flame_odds.title: flame_odds
flame_odds.description: How likely the block will be destroyed by flames when on fire.How likely the block will catch flame when next to a fire.

minecraft:friction.title: minecraft:friction
minecraft:friction.description: Property describing the friction for this block. Friction effects an entities movements when it walks on the block.

minecraft:geometry.title: minecraft:geometry
minecraft:geometry.description: The geometry definition name to use.

minecraft:immovable.title: minecraft:immovable
minecraft:immovable.description: An Immovable block cannot be pushed by pistons

minecraft:map_color.title: minecraft:map_color
minecraft:map_color.description: A color represented as a hex value. This will be the color rendered to a map.

minecraft:material_instances.title: minecraft:material_instances
minecraft:material_instances.description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

minecraft:onlypistonpush.title: minecraft:onlypistonpush
minecraft:onlypistonpush.description: Blocks with those components won't stick to stickyPistons

minecraft:pick_collision.title: minecraft:pick_collision
minecraft:pick_collision.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities

origin.title: origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box

size.title: origin
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component

minecraft:placement_filter.title: minecraft:placement_filter
minecraft:placement_filter.description: Sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed/survive

conditions.title: conditions
conditions.description: List of conditions where the block can be placed/survive

allowed_faces.title: allowed_faces
allowed_faces.description: List of any of the following strings: up, down, north, south, east, west, side, all

block_filter.title: block_filter
block_filter.description: List of blocks (can use tags to specify them) that this block can be placed against in the allowed_faces direction

minecraft:preventsjumping.title: minecraft:preventsjumping
minecraft:preventsjumping.description: this component makes it so actors can't jump when walking on this block

minecraft:random_ticking.title: minecraft:random_ticking
minecraft:random_ticking.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values
